ValidationRule.description: Status must be set to Submitted on Submission
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISCHANGED(Status), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Submitted'))), Community.Name = 'All MPSC/Enterprise', NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), NOT($Profile.Name='2008-09 Operations Administration'), NOT( $Permission.Ideas_edit_access_to_status_field ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: MPSC Ideas must be set to Submitted on Submission. Only Idea Administrators can set other status values.
